pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic 由一组清晰的概念拼装而成：设计、模板、数据、主题、资源。本章聚焦这些关键拼块，帮助你在使用过程中快速定位到需要调整的部分。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"以下章节分别展开说明："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design","children":"设计（Design）"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/template","children":"模板（Template）"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/data","children":"数据（Data）"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme","children":"主题（Theme）"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/resources","children":"资源（Resources）"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme#palette","children":"色板"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme#stylize","children":"图案"}],"等概念在",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme","children":"主题"}],"中阅读"]}]}]]}]]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic is composed of a clear set of concepts: Design, Templates, Data, Themes, and Resources. This chapter focuses on these key building blocks to help you quickly locate the parts you need to adjust during use."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The following sections explain each in detail:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/design","children":"Design"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/template","children":"Templates"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/data","children":"Data"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme","children":"Themes"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/resources","children":"Resources"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["Concepts such as ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme#palette","children":"palettes"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme#stylize","children":"patterns"}]," are covered in ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/theme","children":"Themes"}]]}]}]]}]]
